Normals
========

The normals property hold the normals computed for the point cloud. The factory enables various ways to compute those normals.

Normals Property
-----------------


.. autoclass:: NormalsProperty.NormalsProperty
    :members:
    :undoc-members:

    .. rubric:: Attributes

        :attributes:

    .. rubric:: Methods

        :methods:
